channel.description: Recent content in Discord-Client on Arrans github.io

item.title: Discord-Client-Encyclopedia-Management/Discord3rdparties
item.description: A non-exhaustive collection of third-party clients and mods for Discord.

item.title: uowuo/abaddon
item.description: An alternative Discord client with voice support made with C++ and GTK 3

item.title: mak448a/Qtcord
item.description: Qtcord is a Discord client built with Qt aiming to bring a lightweight, native experience.

item.title: japandotorg/LemonCord
item.description: A fast & light weight Discord Client made with love using the Rust programming language.
